# Neovim Keymaps

## Leader Keys

| Key | Description | Source |
|-----|-------------|--------|
| `<Space>` | Leader key | `lua/config/lazy.lua` |

## General

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>?` | n | Show buffer local keymaps (which-key) | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>e` | n | Toggle file explorer (Neo-tree) | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>o` | n | Format current file | `lua/plugins/formatting.lua` |

## Window Navigation

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>wh` | n | Move to left window | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>wl` | n | Move to right window | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>wj` | n | Move to window below | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>wk` | n | Move to window above | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>ws` | n | Split window horizontally | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>wv` | n | Split window vertically | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>wx` | n | Close current window | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |

## Find (Telescope)

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>/` | n | Live grep in project | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>ff` | n | Find files in current directory | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>fF` | n | Find all files from home directory | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>fb` | n | Find open buffers | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>fr` | n | Find recent files | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>fg` | n | Find git files | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |
| `<leader>fw` | n | Search word under cursor | `lua/plugins/which-key.lua` |

## LSP (Active when LSP attached)

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `gd` | n | Go to definition | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |
| `K` | n | Show hover documentation | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |
| `<leader>ca` | n | Open code actions menu | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |
| `<leader>rn` | n | Rename symbol | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |
| `gr` | n | Find references | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |
| `<leader>d` | n | Show diagnostic in floating window | `lua/plugins/lsp.lua` |

## Flash (Label-based Navigation)

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `s` | n, x, o | Flash jump - search and jump with labels | `lua/plugins/flash.lua` |
| `S` | n, x, o | Flash Treesitter - select treesitter nodes | `lua/plugins/flash.lua` |
| `r` | o | Remote Flash - operate on remote location | `lua/plugins/flash.lua` |
| `R` | o, x | Treesitter search - search within treesitter nodes | `lua/plugins/flash.lua` |
| `<C-s>` | c | Toggle Flash search in command mode | `lua/plugins/flash.lua` |

## NVIM-MD (Markdown Sytax Insertion)

| Keymap | Mode | Description | Source |
|--------|------|-------------|--------|
| `<leader>mb` | n, v | Bold text (wrap with `**`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>mi` | n, v | Italicize text (wrap with `*`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>ms` | n, v | Strikethrough text (wrap with `~~`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>mc` | n, v | Inline code (wrap with backticks) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m1` | n | Make line a level 1 header (`#`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m2` | n | Make line a level 2 header (`##`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m3` | n | Make line a level 3 header (`###`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m4` | n | Make line a level 4 header (`####`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m5` | n | Make line a level 5 header (`#####`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>m6` | n | Make line a level 6 header (`######`) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
| `<leader>mt` | n | Insert todo checkbox (`- [ ] `) | `lua/plugins/nvim-md.lua` |
